subject: Hockey, Ice
Economic Conditions and Trends
Labor and Jobs
Unemployment
lead_paragraph: Before the N.H.L. rejected the deal, the Devils wanted to pay Ilya Kovalchuk more than $100 million to play in a city where thousands are still struggling to make a living and keep their homes.
